about_the_game:
An all new heroine type, the "Extreme Sadist Queen" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D2!
You can now hire "Extreme Sadist" to work at your Empire Club, just like "Muku," "Majime," and "Rindere."

The costumes included in this DLC are compatible with both the High Poly Body and Normal Body.
You can use them in both COM3D2 and COM3D2.5.

～Who is this Extreme Sadist Queen?～
Her meaning of life is to toy with Master. Being an Extreme Sadist does not mean spewing out verbal abuse, but to have fun teasing Master on her own time. She often assails him with questions, reveling in his distressed face, as she thinks of great ways to tease him day by day. You might think she always wants to take the lead in sex, but when her partner tortures her in earnest, you can see a slightly shy, womanly side of her.

• You can enjoy training, job communication, and scenes as a maid working in the Empire Club with Extreme Sadist Queen!

"Extreme Sadist" is not compatible with the following DLC packs.
Please purchase each of the following DLC packs separately to make "Extreme Sadist" compatible with the content listed.

CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 GP-01
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-02
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-01Fb

"GP-01Fb" for "Extreme Sadist" is presently under development.
Even in Japan, the development status of GP01, GP02, and GP01Fb varies for each heroine type.
After development has concluded in Japan, the pack must then be translated. We appreciate your understanding that this takes time.
We are moving forward with development in hopes of releasing these packs quickly, so we thank you for your patience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

An all new heroine type, the "Extreme Sadist Queen" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D2!
You can now hire "Extreme Sadist" to work at your Empire Club, just like "Muku," "Majime," and "Rindere."

The costumes included in this DLC are compatible with both the High Poly Body and Normal Body.
You can use them in both COM3D2 and COM3D2.5.

～Who is this Extreme Sadist Queen?～
Her meaning of life is to toy with Master. Being an Extreme Sadist does not mean spewing out verbal abuse, but to have fun teasing Master on her own time. She often assails him with questions, reveling in his distressed face, as she thinks of great ways to tease him day by day. You might think she always wants to take the lead in sex, but when her partner tortures her in earnest, you can see a slightly shy, womanly side of her.

• You can enjoy training, job communication, and scenes as a maid working in the Empire Club with Extreme Sadist Queen!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8.1/10 (All versions must be 64-bit.)
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad-core 2.5Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720 or higher, DirectX11 compatible GPU mid-range or above / GeForce GTX 560 or above OR Radeon R7 260X or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: [About GPU] Not guaranteed to work with Laptops, all in one desktops, and tablet PCs. Not guaranteed to work with Mobile GPU and IntelHD Series GPU. Does not correspond with RadeonHD Series GPU. Please install the latest Graphic Driver that is provided by your PC brand. [About VR device] In the case you playing in VR mode, please meet the minimum system requirements of your VR device. Please install the latest Runtime that is provided by HMD brand. [About Internet Environment] This product does not need internet connection to play, however, some contents will not be available offline. Not compatible with mobile Internet connection and tethering devices. [About OS] Not compatible with 32bitOS. Guaranteed to work only with the latest service pack. Please follow the warranty period of OS providers. Windows 7 has been announced that the warranty lasts until January, 2020.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8.1/10 (All versions must be 64-bit.)
  • Processor: Core i5 Quad-core 3Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 or higher, GeForce GTX 760 or above mid-range to high-end
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
